name: Salida
description:
Description:

An adventurer get stuck in dangerous swamp. The adventurer must to get out the swamp before time limit, because if stay for too the adventurer will die. So adventurers must leave the swamp before the time limit so they don't die. But there are enemies scattered around who want to kill adventurers. So adventurers must pass the enemy and must be before the time runs out

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Concept:

Run-A-Way is a simple 2D platform game that requires the player to reach some location in a limited time. The goals is to get out the swamp before the time runs out. The challenges are the route that player need to passed has enemy so and  player can be killed because the enemy. This game only contain 2 challenge level with the time given is 45  second to finish both level to get out of the swamp.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

If this is your first time playing this game, please play the tutorial first and read the instruction for best experience.

  • Press the "Right" ( → ) or "Left" (  ← ) button to move the adventurer .
  • Press the "Up" ( ↑ ) button to jump.
  • Press the "x" ( X) button to attack.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Source Code:

You can access the source code for this game here.

_______________________________________________________________________________________
